source1: static inline void mix_2f_1r_to_stereo(AC3DecodeContext *ctx) { int i; float (*output)[256] = ctx->audio_block.block_output; for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) { output[1][i] += output[2][i]; output[2][i] += output[3][i]; } memset(output[3], 0, sizeof(output[3])); }
source2:
static inline int cris_bound_w(int v, int b) { int r = v; asm ("bound.w	%1, %0
" : "+r" (r) : "ri" (b)); return r; }
